title: battle
text:
as soon as the beat drops you know im bound to rhyme/
my punchlines are so raw i make any other mc sound polite/
dont be stoopid and say authentic is showin a wack verse/
youll be more out of your place than an eskimo in the desert/
im back at it and crash wackness with rap tactiks/
it goes hand in hand like crack addicts and bad habits/
i be a specialist dont tell me shit like im creating a song wrong/
its like tellin einstein your mathmatical equation is all flaws/
get it when i say/my medaphoars be great/
rappers to me are pedafiles to parents who took theyre kid trough a stagetory rape/
national geographic/askin is he on that shit/
yup this is guerilla rap im matchin sean p when rappin/
im anything but normal cause hey i honestyle say/im flawlessly great/
in hours your career is the half of 40 plus 8 call it a day/
i look down on those who envy me/
youll shed so many bitter tears you be drownin in your jealousy/
im authentic who the hell is you/
police make suspects hear to your tracks so they tell the truth/
my rhymebook has the greatest rhymes/you shook and affraid that i/
make your career look like a waste of time/
i wont fold under pressure i be terrific in crunchtime/
big pun and L would have used my name in a egostistcal punchline/
your lines aint shit i how do i know you got a stoopid mind/
cause pen and teller could make a show about your book of rhymes/
of ill lines i bring more than what a partial rappers averages/
i keep ‘em commin like marshall mathers managers/
the medaphoar lord will have you in this war killed/with raw skills/
me on the mic is like a torture method from the saw films/
anything less than excelence/i laugh cause its wack i cant pretend/
a venomous text i represent/crash your defense its evident/
get it correct me you shouldnt come against mc’in/
im so ahead of you that lyrical ability you dont comprehed the meaning/
im authentic the exception/your trash and can not rap son/
know that if you pas me the pic your handin me a veapon/
so label me armed and dangerous/my hatred is raw dont make me pissed/
tell me who is creating his bars as great as this/
quit dreaming about defeating me that you just can't achive
i smack all these wack mc's/till they pack up their bags and leave/
i am just like apathy on a good day i hope you see it so clear/
that dissin me is like harlem in 95, dont you even go there/
www.myspace.com/authenticonthamic

replies.text: how do i know you got a stoopid mind/

Hann er að segja að þetta sé vitlaust skrifað …
Það er stupid :)
jamm frekar stupid að benda á eihvað svona
Frekar stupid að segja eitthvað sé stupid með þvi að skrifa eitthvað vitlaust:/

Þú skrifaðir eihvað, sem er ekki rétt ;)
En ég sagði þetta ekki, heldur vinur minn.

and who cares? þoli ekki svona orðaforða mellur sem gera ekkert annað en að hanga inná huga að leiðretta folk ég veit allveg hverning skrifa skal eitthvað er bara vanur að skrifa eihvað þanning screw you buddy

ég veit allveg hverning skrifa skal
LOL
